title: To whichever Rioter designed Illaoi...

The last "sexy" champion released was Ahri. What we had after her was:

* a series of fully armoured "srs business" fighters {{champion:113}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:131}} {{champion:254}} {{champion:133}} {{champion:429}} (very much overdone at this point)
* a couple of angsty "girls in a costume" {{champion:143}} {{champion:134}} with too much cleavage whose outfit did not really fit their personality (note: "sexualized" does not mean "sexy")
* "I'M SO ANCIENT" 30-sth-looking generic females {{champion:60}} {{champion:127}}, with Elise counting also to the previous category of "unnecessarily cleavage"
* lighthearted joyful girls {{champion:117}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:222}} (...we need more of that)
* as-good-as-genderless {{champion:421}} (though gender is a key part of her character, one of the only traits she has)
* Kindred (by lore "they", by gameplay "her").

So yeah, Illaoi is a great addition, but we don't have to pretend it's a revolution. At least she looks appropriate for her class, unlike release Sejuani with her ridiculous bikini armor.

To be totally fair, what makes one woman "sexy" in a certain individual's eyes may be *radically* different to someone else.

Still loving how everyone's commenting about how sexy all the female champions are and comparing them when no one did this for Braum{{champion:201}}  and Azir{{champion:268}} , the last humanoid adult male champions (Tahm{{champion:223}} , Ekko{{champion:245}} , and Vel{{champion:161}}  don't really count, as much as I love the first and third). Just everyone should stop feeling the need to objectify things like women's bodies- its a video game and naturally there will be differing physiques, doesnt mean you should all rush to pretend to be feminist or only focus that she's just a fucking muscular female.

When Darius{{champion:122}}  and Braum{{champion:201}}  were released, there weren't threads glorifying Rito putting strong, muscular men into League. Its all a double standard and I really wish that this community can get past the fact that the newest champion has both a vagina _and _ muscles. And I say this as a lesbian who goes to the gym regularly. I want to still be playing the day when it doesn't matter what the newest champion looks like or what tropes and images they embody, only the fact that they are fucking awesome and will have something to contribute to the meta and be a really fun new champion.
